dmca.title: DMCA Notice: Bajangles.com/Sony Camcorder
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Badlotto, Jill [mailto:jill@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, May 24, 2006 4:19 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Notice: Bajangles.com/Sony Camcorder
Subject: DMCA Notice: Bajangles.com/Sony Camcorder


The below is a Cease and Desist letter referencing your client Bajangles.com and our
client Sony with specific respects to Sony Camcorder. Your client continues the use
the copyrighted images/text and/or trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder. The notice
was originally sent to your client on 4/10/2006 and you on 4/24/2006. As of this
time the website was rechecked and the infringing material has not been removed in
its entirety. We are informing you and your client again in an attempt to get this
resolved. Please assist us in having this material removed from your clients'
website. 
________________________________

Phoenix Office:


Ellis & Venable


101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875


Phoenix, Arizona 85003

voice: (602) 631-9393

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

5/24/2006

 

 


7005 1820 0001 9159 2084


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Pwy.Ste. 110

Dallas,TX.75207

 

Re:       Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with
respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.  

 

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
